mapper.insert:
insert into tb_terminalonlinercd
f_time,
f_terminalNo,
f_state,
#{params.time}, null,
#{params.terminalNo}, null,
#{params.state}, null,

insert into tb_terminalonlinercd (f_time, f_terminalNo, f_state) values
(#{item.time}, #{item.terminalNo}, #{item.state})
mapper.update:
update tb_terminalonlinercd
f_id = #{obj.id}, f_id = null,
f_time = #{obj.time}, f_time = null,
f_terminalNo = #{obj.terminalNo}, f_terminalNo = null,
f_state = #{obj.state}, f_state = null,
and f_id = #{tag.id} and f_id is null
and f_time = #{tag.time} and f_time is null
and f_terminalNo = #{tag.terminalNo} and f_terminalNo is null
and f_state = #{tag.state} and f_state is null
mapper.select:
select f_id as id, f_time as time, f_terminalNo as terminalNo, f_state as state from tb_terminalonlinercd
and f_id = #{params.id} and f_id is null
and f_id in(#{item})
and f_id >= #{params.minId} and f_id < #{params.maxId} and f_id like '%${params.subId}%' and f_id like '%${params.startsWithId}' and f_id like '${params.endsWithId}%'
and f_time = #{params.time} and f_time is null
and f_time in(#{item})
and f_time >= #{params.minTime} and f_time < #{params.maxTime} and f_time like '%${params.subTime}%' and f_time like '%${params.startsWithTime}' and f_time like '${params.endsWithTime}%'
and f_terminalNo = #{params.terminalNo} and f_terminalNo is null
and f_terminalNo in(#{item})
and f_terminalNo >= #{params.minTerminalNo} and f_terminalNo < #{params.maxTerminalNo} and f_terminalNo like '%${params.subTerminalNo}%' and f_terminalNo like '%${params.startsWithTerminalNo}' and f_terminalNo like '${params.endsWithTerminalNo}%'
and f_state = #{params.state} and f_state is null
and f_state in(#{item})
and f_state >= #{params.minState} and f_state < #{params.maxState} and f_state like '%${params.subState}%' and f_state like '%${params.startsWithState}' and f_state like '${params.endsWithState}%'
order by
${item.name} desc
limit 0, 1
